description: Friendships are the family we choose. Nurturing these relationships is vital for happiness, support, and a sense of belonging in adult life.
sentences: Adult friendships require conscious effort to maintain.
Quality is more important than quantity.
Be the kind of friend you want to have.
Friendships will evolve as life circumstances change (marriage, kids, moves).
A true friend celebrates your successes and supports you in your failures.
dos: Schedule regular catch-ups, even if it's just a quick call.
Show up for them during tough times.
donts: Don't be the friend who only reaches out when you need something.
Don't take your friends for granted.
Don't let small misunderstandings ruin a long friendship.
